data.name: Active Saver
data.description: Be rewarded for actively saving and leaving your money alone with bonus interest.

features.additionalInfo: Manage your account from anywhere with our Internet Banking or mobile banking app.

constraints.additionalInfo: Deposit min $250 p/mth AND No withdrawals
No maximum balance, bonus interest applies to balances up to $500,000

eligibility.additionalInfo: To apply you need to be 16 years or over.

eligibility.additionalValue: You must have an Australian residential address.
eligibility.additionalInfo: You must have an Australian residential address.

eligibility.additionalValue: Be registered for Australian Unity Internet Banking and have an email address.
eligibility.additionalInfo: Be registered for Australian Unity Internet Banking and have an email address.

fees.name: Staff assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each transaction we perform on your behalf. Including but not limited to: BPAY, periodical payments, balance enquiries, electronic transfers, external transfers (such as to a nonAustralian Unity Bank Limited account) and other transactions performed by us. Other transactions include any transaction from/to your account that is manually processed by Australian Unity Bank staff that Australian Unity determines to be a staff assisted transaction.

fees.name: Electronic funds transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each transaction we perform on your behalf. Including but not limited to: BPAY, periodical payments, balance enquiries, electronic transfers and other transaction. Terms and Conditions and fees and charges apply to the eligible account.

fees.name: Same day EFT (via RTGS)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to when you request same-day EFT be made to a non Australian Unity account. Terms and Conditions and fees and charges apply to the eligible account.

fees.name: Paper Statement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request paper statements. Electronic statements through internet banking are fee free. Terms and Conditions and fees and charges apply to the eligible account.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Be rewarded for actively saving and leaving your money alone with bonus interest.
Bonus interest applies to balances up to $500K but base interest has no maximum balance.
